name: chessPressDiscordBot
description: intended bot functions: 1. Verify users account via command and match role accordingly (based on rank) 2. ability to either auto update rank, or have a command which allows users to update their rank manually (via command to parse website) 3. input .png files (or just paste moves) and create a puzzle accordingly (https://www.chess.com/goto_daily_puzzle) 4. auto role for trainers 5. automatically sync news from either: chessbase, chess.com, lichess or whereever I can find that allows such a thing. 6. challenge command which dms both you and a specified user a link to a match
